name: Kill Switch (itch) (fatedgamedeveloper)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

1. Tap  SPACE to order a kill or HOLD SPACE to pass and move on to the next target.

2. The enemy is adapting so the drone target designator cannot always be trusted. LOOK FOR ANY EVIDENCE THAT THE TARGET IS NOT HUMAN.

The drone will automatically patrol the are so you can command it safely from your console. Once engaged the drone will automatically select targets and give a target designation.  As the operator your job is to verify the target and give the kill order. 

ONE BUTTON JAM ENTRY (My First Game Jam)

The infiltrators have invaded our forces and are walking among us. Use your drone and it's colour coded target designation system to identify targets and eliminate them. Beware, the enemy is getting crafty and the deeper you go the more deceptive their appearance and the harder it will be for the drone to automatically identify enemy targets.

THEME

One Button: all controls apart from menus done by one button

Two Colors:

1. The main puzzle element (Target ID) uses two colors to deceive the player

2. Limited color pallette
